institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal Human Resources Development Support Project Operation Rules/Article 32 (Conditions for Participation in Training Support Center)
contents: Article 32 (Conditions for Participation in Training Support Center) ① In order to support the expansion and improvement of training for companies and workers who are underprivileged in vocational training, the Chairman of the Board of Directors shall establish a Small and Medium Business Training Support Center (hereinafter referred to as the *Center) through procedures such as open contest targeting private professional organizations. It can be designated and operated. ② Private specialized organizations are organizations with vocational training consulting capabilities and a dedicated organization, but application qualifications may be limited to reflect the characteristics of the task., ③ Organizations wishing to participate in the project must use two or more organizations to supplement business capabilities. You can participate by forming this consortium, and at this time, organizations other than the consortium organizer do not apply restrictions on application qualifications.
